Reasons of why you should not buy dead by daylight and why you should avoid it and save your money on something better instead or just hold out until things get better for the game.

1. infested with cheaters and hackers that could hold the game hostage and ddos the servers and also track IPS which playing without a VPN is a terrible idea if you're a streamer (and also another thing to mention but i will let you look up what happened to some streamers that got their ips tracked) and I'm quite sure the devs won't do nothing about it yet, and speaking of devs

2. devs don't care mostly about the games health or performance, plus on their official twitter they just announced they where working and supporting NFTs with the pinhead dlc and want to milk every little penny out of your pocket, legit the most careless and soulless devs besides *some other big name video game corporations*

3. really horrible community that's an absolute wreck and if you don't trust me just look up some videos on youtube about some streamers and random players *and yeah places like twitch really allow that stuff* 

4. mostly stuffed to the brim with paid DLC with perks that are somewhat OP or complete trash. and its an awful experience if your a new player and have to go through the grind; BTW there is a battle pass as well that's mostly stuffed with garbage charms and ugly cosmetics.

5. the gameplay gets very stale after at least probably a few hours of play with the same objective aka hold m1 for a thousand years on a generator and watch out for skill checks as well and run if you see the killer and avoid getting downed and if you mess up you get hooked and have to wait for someone to run and help *god i wish there was something you can do while you wait for someone to rescue you on the hook or on the ground* but the devs probably won't change anything about the objective or making the game fun outside of perks and killers.

and that should be about it, there are more better reasons of why not to buy this absolute train wreck of a game but i would rather keep this short and not turn this into a giant rant but over all not a lot of redeeming quality's about dead by daylight besides music in my opinion. but over all ill give the game a 3.5/ 10 the game is just awful mostly and amazed this game even lasted 5 YEARS BY THE WAY or more soon by the time of making this, just what an absolute joke of a game and developers and might as well include the community; reminds me of siege. Oh yeah one more thing by mathieu cote *btw he is someone at bhvr* and i quote ( I think we did a pretty good job so far)
Great game, I play it all the time!

I highly recommend this game but like with every other game there are problems. Personally I would love to see a voice chat the survivors can join in to talk and player hit boxes need to be improved. The game has gotten worse as it has progressed but it isnt aweful and I still love to play it. I would also like to see more emotes for survivors and maybe some for killers too. Over all this game is pretty good and definetly has a lot of potential.

Dead by Daylight is a phenomenon. Strangers to Dead By Daylight don't understand the game. They wonder: How can a game with such a plain gameplay have thousands of players? All survivors need to do on any map is repairing generators that power up gates that can be opened. Surely, such a game won't keep players interested for a long time? Eventually, players must get bored, right? One might think they should. But the opposite is happening. DBD has even spread to new platforms. Undoubtedly, some players might genuinely like this game. Other players might be suffering from sunk cost fallacy. Remember that DBD is selling many outfit skins for 10 [sic!] bucks each. Now, if you were a player who bought some of them, you might think: "I can't just stop playing the game". Otherwise you'd be forced to come to the realization that you fell into a marketing trap, helped by the rise of DBD on twitch and the many streamers wearing fancy outfits. This is not something I want to see in a video game.

Even though the gameplay is nothing special, many players will have many hours in this game since it is an easy get-go game to play with your friends. I have hundreds of hours in DBD, yet I have nothing to show for - only regret. I would say that I spent around shocking 50% of my playtime either in the lobby or spending bloodpoints in the bloodweb. And I have seen DBD at its worst. I'm speaking of waiting times up to 20min, which is longer than a match lasts. I'm speaking of crashes of either you or one of the other 4 players 4 out of 10 times. I'm speaking of crashes that occured whenever any players used the bloody party streamers offering. If you don't know: This is a thing that makes this grindy game a bit less grindy. I and many other players lost millions of bloodpoints because they can't fix their game. There are still ground-breaking bugs in DBD. The devs claim that they have problems fixing the bugs because of their spaghetti code. This might be true, but instead of committing to bugfixes, they are still spamming DLC updates. Also, every single update breaks the game and adds 30 new bugs to it. They don't seem to be testing their updates much at all. This is why every hyped up event they are running is plagued by massive bugs every year. Even the devs started to joke about the bug-ridden state of the game in the loading screens. 

Good games are the ones you like to remember. DBD won't be a game where I will look back to all the fond memories and be glad that I played it. There is no rewarding "sense of pride and accomplishment". Nothing. And for that, DBD deserves a negative review.

Никаких изменений  в игре за 3 года игры, разве что изменены карты, что приятно, конечно, но делать одно и тоже уже 3 года не особо тянет, а разработчики ничего не хотят выпускать нового в игру. Последние главы просто смехотворные и странные маньяки, играть за которых нет никакого желания, так же, от отличии от других игр, батл пасс закрывается спокойно и ты сидишь ещё месяц-два в ожидании нового, а батл пасс является единственным контентом в игре, но даже его они умудрились испортить.
Le jeu en soi est bon, mais miné par des bugs et des problèmes de connection

People talk about how toxic the community is but there are way more helful, friendly people in the community. This is the ultimate hide and seek game with your favorite cult classic killers. Each Killer and survivor play a unique style with limitless potential for customization and replayability. I'm just dissapointed I waited years to get this because of comments like the toxic community. The community is what we make it and so far, so great! Get this game on sale or full price, because it's very much worth it! Happy Hunting...

Jogo explêndido, possuí um ótimo gráfico, mesmo sendo leve para a máquina, não dando trabalho pesado para a mesma, e contém uma variedade insana de mapas, sobreviventes e assassinos, sempre tendo um sobrevivente ou assassino para treinar e subir de nível, ou um mapa para saber como ele é, as mecânicas tanto de assassinar quanto de sobreviver são extremamente bem feitas, em um jogo onde todos os 5 jogam muito bem, o resultado é inédito, porque é tão bem balanceado que quase impossível numa situação dessas 2 sobreviventes não conseguirem sair e os outros 2 não morrerem, basta todos jogarem de maneira adequada, mas tem um fator que pode estragar a graça completamente do jogo, "campers", que ao prender alguém no gancho o indivíduo fica extremamente próximo até o sobrevivente morrer, e vai fazendo isso até vencer, tornando a vitória ou a fuga de algum sobrevivente praticamente impossível, acredito que deveria ser colocada uma punição extremamente forte durante a partida que há algum "camper" para beneficiar os sobreviventes ou um banimento ou punição do tipo para os assassinos que realizarem isso.
Nao consigo achar partida, sera que ninguem mais joga ?

Игра хорошая , мои товарищи в игре вроде нормальные . Не советую играть с тупыми друзьями , которые бомбят до дикой степени ( Ливает с Дискорда /Скайпа \ Тимспика ; выходит из игры при даунизме  ; орёт на тебя из-за своей смерти ,  из-за того , что он сам умер по своей ошибке ) Советую играть!

まず最初に私はキラーメインでプレイしています。サバイバー、キラー、どちらも赤帯まで行った事がある、くらいのプレイ時間です。その上でのレビューとなります。

ゲームのデザインは素晴らしく、大変スリリングで面白いです。
思いっきり隠れんぼに特化したサバイバーもよし。逃げることに特化したキャラもよし。
キラー側は、パークやアドオンによって性質がガラリと変わる者もいて、多彩で面白いです。

ただし問題点がいくつかあります。
VCPTと初心者狩りによるキラーへの煽りのせいか、キラー側で心に余裕が無くなっている人が多々見受けられます。
また、サバイバー側で緊張から開放されてハイになったせいか、無意味に煽り行為をする人も見受けられます。

ランクが上がればそういった人は少なくなっていきますが、まだ初心者で低ランクのうちはお互いに、煽り煽られの関係になりがちです。
相手の時間を無駄に消費させるサバイバー側の残業行為や、キラーの側の無意味なケバブ行為など、面白くない人とマッチした時の問題から逃れる方法が無い為、結果、切断や耐久放棄や自殺などゲームにならない行為に時々遭遇します。

少人数対戦ゆえ、そういった人の行為がモロに出るゲームですが、ゲームデザインは本当に素晴らしいです。

後は、サバイバー、キラーを問わず、問題を起こすユーザーを如何にコントロールするか。
運営の能力が問われる部分に期待です。

個人的にユーザーを通報するのではなく、単純にブロックしたユーザーとマッチしないようになるだけで、不快な行為をするユーザーを遠ざけられて快適な環境に出来ないものかと考えています。
サバイバーですぐ切断する人はキラー側から見てもサバイバー側から見ても不快ですし、ケバブ行為をするキラーなど論外です。

おまけで言いますと、ゲームバランスを崩壊させているVCPTはいい加減なんとかしてほしいです。
ゲームになりません。
一方的に相手側のBP稼ぎに付き合わされます。
このゲームのルール上、情報共有されて発電機を直されたらキラーは絶対勝てません。
ゲームのデザインで一定のチェイスが認められてる以上、そのルールを無視できるナースでしか勝てません。

せめてVCPTを受け入れる代わりにキラー側のBPにボーナスを付けてくれれば、まだ文句は無いんですがね。
本来レビューに書くことでは無いのですが、どうにも不満が大きいので愚痴も書いてしまいました。

どのゲームでも運営に対する不満は出てきますが、まだDbDは頭マークの運営よりは遥かにマシです。
時々極端なバランス調整でやらかす事もありますが、その度に 一応 対応は 間違いなく やっていますのでね。

それだけで、アプデの度に「今が最高にクソゲー」と言われる何処かのマークが運営しているゲームより遥かにマシで素晴らしいです。

それ故に、まだ期待が出来るゲームです。DbDは。

après mais 200h de jeu je constate beaucoup de problèmes, 

tout d'abord, nous avons l'optimisation du jeu qui demande énormément de ressource ce qui es affolant sachant que le jeu en es à sa 3ème année.

ensuite, l'équilibrage de certain tueur qui tout simplement mauvais, certain sont extrêmement fort es malgré qu'ils soit utilisé par des joueur débutant il reste tout aussi fort et d'autre sont extrêmement faible comme Amanda ou bien Freddy qui sont loin d'être assez fort pour réussir des 4/4 à toute les parti.

pour terminer il serait judicieux de refaire vivre le jeu avec plus d'événement et de contenu tel que des skin.

Я считаю, что эта игра самая лучшая среди игр похожего жанра. не слушайте нытиков которые говорят о туннелинге и кемпе, это просто одна из тактик игры за маньяка, это не запрещено, сурвы могут собрать стак, и это будет куда хуже для маньяка, нежели кемп и туннелинг. донат в игре крайне дешевый, огромное количество выживших и убийц. геймплей может показаться однообразным, но в каждой игре будет что-то уникальное. Багов, к сожалению или к счастью здесь много. на моей памяти так было всегда, но они больше приносят смеха чем злости. за свои деньги эта игра дает огромное количество эмоций
todo bien solo que les falta servidores dedicados

Gerilim aksiyon macera! Hepsi yeterince var. Tam bir fiyat performans oyunu. 4 kişi jeneratörleri çalıştırıp avcıdan kaçmaya çalışıyor. Kesinlikle takım çalışmasını ön planda tutan bir oyun. Avcı olmak zor ama iyi bir avcı 4 kişiyi de kaçmadan öldürebilir. Tek başına oynandığında da eğlenceli ancak arkadaşlarla oynamak için birebir.

Самая забагованная игра которую я видел. Даже патчи ничего не меняют, баги просто меняются с одного на другого. Постоянные вылеты во время загрузки, хрен знает какой подбор по рангам, разрабы вообще никак не борятся с кемперством - "это же механика игры, это тактика такая". Да в гробу я видел такую тактику, я игру покупал не для того чтобы полкатки провисеть овощем, а другую половину тупо качать палец жатием кнопки. На низких рангах ещё можно играть, на высоких пукан воспылается ярче квазара потому что кемперов там всё больше и больше, да и вне зависимости от ранга загорится от частых вылетов и бесконечных загрузок. Баланс между маньяками и выжившими вообще не баланс, но в пятнице 13 он куда хуже, так что ладно. Плюс практически никакого противодействия репортам и читерству.
Горит крч.

This game is fun if u play with friends, otherwise in my opinion is kinda boring, i played it alot and i had fun but the part with the killers that as a survivor u cant do anything to a killer when is camping is kinda frustrating, there's kind of ppl that they are sitting face 2 face camping u while ur on hook. The comunity is kinda toxic but if u dont look at this parts the game is good, it has a good graphic and there's not manny hackers like in other games. It's a good ideea with the generators to make and open the gate so u can finish the round, the killers are well made, but in my opinion there's Pallets ingame missing, as a survivor u dont have alot of escapes. They should work on that. Besides those things the game is great. I like it and im gonna still play it but please, atleast ban the people who are stream sniping streamers or face camping. Is not fun at all.

Don't buy this shitty ass game untill the killer called "The Legion" is removed. Come at me Legion mains, I will logic your asses out of Mars.

So you people are telling me a killer with a guaranteed down isn't boring to go up against? If a Legion fully commits to chasing a single person they will get downed no matter what. "Same goes for every killer" well let's look at Wraith or even Billy, they could get looped for 5 gens if they are trash, but have you ever seen a Legion who got looped for 5 gens? It does not matter how skillful or trash you are, you simply press right click you get a speed boost, recovery speed (attacking) and the ability to vault over pallets or windows, shutting down the only way a survivor could counter against a killer. 

"Just play stealthy duheuhueheuh" survivors could play stealthy but have you seen a match where a killer fails to find a single survivor for the entire game? No? Then someone will get downed, and during frenzy the survivors' location are shown to you, "but that's the role of the killers" of course it is, and the killers are suppose to be the powerful being that goes against the 4 survivors, so it makes sense for the killer to be strong, but it doesn't make sense to make survivors incapable of countering against killers, you can vault pallets and windows faster than survivors with a massive speed boost that last for nearly 10 seconds, if you can't get someone downed? You're trash, if you can? That is just normal because you're playing Legion.

"His power has a penalty" no shit sherlock even a rank 20 would notice that, but the penalty is not enough for survivors to get their bearings, "Nurse has a much more op power why you not complain?" because Nurse require skills, you need to predict the movement of survivors and you can't hit them once and wait until they bleed out, not only that, everytime after Nurse blinks, she gets exhausted and look towards to ground, having a very unclear visual of her surroundings and the survivors' location, what does Legion have instead? Just holding his hands up while screaming like the degenerates playing him after getting outplayed, you can still clearly look at the survivors while having that exhausted animation, then proceeds to chase up to the survivors.

"He only has 110% movement speed" but that doesn't matter when his power boosts his movement speed to a million percent, you can just use your power and you will catch up and get a hit off in no time, unlike other killers where they have to go all the way around pallets or windows (yes killers can vault windows but it is slower than survivors even with Bamboozled, unless you are T3 Myers or Wraith using shadow dance addon) causing them to lose distance, while Legion just yeets over pallets and window so fast during frenzy if the survivor does not have Lithe it's a guaranteed hit for the Legion then his power gauage just get filled for another easy hit.

"Survivors can 360 him during frenzy" they could, but I doubt they can pull it off 5 times consistently every 20 seconds, because the recovery time during his frenzy is so fast that you can actually hit a wall 10 times before the power gauage runs out and 20 times if you are using the duration addon. Plus its not like 360s are easy to pull off.

"Legion is weak because he can not proc NOED or Devour Hope during frenzy" I don't think I need to explain this one? Because having a killer with more movement speed from NOED or Devour Hope that runs at you faster than other killers who could also vault over pallets or windows faster than you vault them while also being able to miss 3 hits without penalty can insta down you is straight up retarded, if you have ever had the impression that this would have worked then please I am concerned for you health, get a doctor please.

"Survivors can still use OP perks like Decisive Strike and they can still gen rush Legion, plus survivors could still use items" every killer has to go against that, so it really isn't a valid arguement, and items? Insta-heals don't work on deep wound status so its worthless and flashlights don't work because there are no animation that is 3.33 seconds time for Legion except for picking up a survivor, so items won't do much against a Legion.

"Legion is bad without addons" no he is not, you can still get guaranteed downs easily without addons, it just takes 5-10 more seconds to do so, time is indeed precious for killers and 10 seconds could cause an entire game, but that is your own problem then for being bad at the game so survivors could counter a Legion. So what if you use addons? Iredecent ones are alright, cooldowns, duration and movement are also decent, but Frank's Mixtape is as broken as a 50 blink Nurse you can down people in 7 seconds if you use your power correctly, a 7 seconds chase for every situation, in killer shack, in jungle gyms and at infinites a 7 second down, yeah sure that's balanced.

"Legion can not get kills without tunneling or camping" he can, you're just trash, even Freddy can get 4ks without tunneling or camping, so can a Legion.

"This killer is fun" yeah, he is, for the killer only. You can finally dominate the match by playing Legion because there isn't a single way to counter him. But survivors on the other hand, have to deal with a killer that can just brainlessly chase them with next to 0 effort and is capable of tunneling so efficiently that all the killers would be jealous of it. "Nurse, billy and spirit can also tunnel" yeah but they require skills to land hits on people, unlike Legion.

Try to use logic instead of insults, maybe that would help you sweaty tryhard Legion mains to win an argument or two, especially those who can't construct a sentence properly, yet decided to come out to poorly insult someone to embrasse themselves. Not only does that indicate that you have a very poor personality (attacking people just because their opinion differs to yours) and how childish you are for using insults instead of brains. Dead by Daylight consegue transformar seus medos e pesadelos em diversão. No entanto a diversão pode ser garantida apenas se jogar com os amigos. Sozinho pode frustrar devido a necessidade da comunicação e do trabalho em equipe durante a jogatina como sobrevivente. Jogando como assassino, esses problemas são extintos, mas surge a repetição por ficar preso em apenas um modo de jogo. A experiência do game se limita também a quantidade de DLCs (dependendo da versão que adquirir), já que o jogo base não possui muitos assassinos no elenco com a soma de que o game só possui um modo de jogo.

Ya tengo 250 horas, varios personajes a niveles altos y mucha experiencia.
 * Primero voy a decir que no importa si tengas un internet de 2mbps o 200mbps, el juego te anda igual, dependés del killer en caso de que juegues de survivor. La mayoría de partidas encontras un ping promedio de 250ms o 300ms.
 * Los hitboxes están hechos horribles, el killer te puede pegar desde 2 metros en ciertos casos con partidas algo lageadas y no es solo culpa del lag, si no del hitbox. Si sos experto y sabes hacer 360, el killer solo tiene que mover rapido su mouse para cualquier lado prácticamente y te pega igual gracias al Hitbox.
 * Muchos dlc a mi parecer, con ventajas que en parte son PayToWin, (No tengo ds, barbacoa y chile, muerte de franklin, étc) con suerte te sale una perk en el santuario de los secretos, pero casi siempre son perks de personajes no dlc.
 * La movilidad me parece buena, de survivor podés ver por los costados o arriba donde está el killer mientras vos te escondes, mientras que de killer esto no se puede, es en 1era persona.
 * Las partidas privadas están bugeadisimas, el ds no funciona casi nunca, el chungo aveces no funciona, étc.
 * Tiene bastantes bugs, en su mayoría visuales pero también hay otros que salís volando o cosas del estilo, además de que los visuales como uno que te hace sangrar como si te reventaran una arteria hacen que el killer te pueda ver aunque estés atrás de un árbol o roca.
 * Falta muchisimas cosas a mi parecer y el juego sería algo famoso, como más opciones de personalización en privadas (como elegir que perks se pueden usar, poder jugar con más de 4 survivors) 
 * Ya dije que el ping depende en un 99% del killer, así que hace tiempo que rogamos servidores dedicados para que no sea molesto el tema del ping/lag. (Supuestamente lo implementan este año)
 * Es increíblemente adictivo, lo único que te quita las ganas de jugar son killers tóxicos o survivors trolls.
 * Sistema de reportes INÚTIL. Reportes por lo que sea a alguien solo está de decoración.
 * Se permite el tuneleo y facecampeo (Solo dicen que se permiten para no tomarse la molestia de banearlos) capaz te bajan de un gancho y te sigue persiguiendo a vos, te vuelve a enganchar y se queda en frente del gancho el resto de la partida.
 * Ganar BloodPoints es enormemente difícil, con una partida algo buena ganas 20K bloodpoints y te los gastás fácil en 4 cosas verdes (Valen 5k cada una) 15 minutos de partida para mejorar 4 cosas de la red de sangre y para pasar de nivel son como 15 cosas que hay que comprar.
 
 En fin, creo que no tengo mucho más que opinar. ¿Recomiendo el juego? Sí, tiene un precio algo bueno y es muy adictivo aunque en la mayoría de partidas quieras partir el teclado contra el monitor por uno de los 40 errores que mencioné anteriormente. Si el juego está en oferta te recomiendo mucho que lo compres. Pese a que la mayoría de cosas que dije eran negativas, igualmente lo recomiendo porque tiene un buen precio, es adictivo y jugar con amigos es lo mejor del mundo acá.

The developers have just been trying to milk this game for as much money as possible adding in new characters and maps rather than fixing any of the bugs in this game, but that's fine. Understandable. The gaming industry has already begun making clones of DBD — may I remind you of Propnight  — and these future games will have nothing to contribute to the industry. Propnight has nothing original in its game. Instead it's just half DBD and the other half Prop Hunt from Garry's Mod. So please don't play Propnight. Play this game instead. Even if it isn't perfect, at least it is original.
